description: Wrote code in Python for the analysis of biomolecule simulations. Contributed to development of tools in Python for analysis of biomolecule simulations

Adapted and improved existing methods for the computational analysis of high-throughput protein-RNA binding assays. Implemented a deep learning model to investigate DNA sequence features important for gene regulation and silencing. Implemented automated workflows for processing and statistical analysis of high-throughput datasets to uncover mammalian gene expression patterns and Markov state modelling to estimate kinetic parameters of gene expression.
